title: How to Create an Admin Game Pass in Roblox

steps.headline: Go to your game page and click "Create a Game Pass".
Wait.
steps.description: When you finish uploading your game pass, press "Configure this Game Pass".

steps.headline: Tick 'Sell this item' and enter price.
Then open your game in Edit mode.
Press Insert, then Search and type Kohl's Admin Commands V2 (I use this model too.
steps.description: It has lots of commands and no viruses, so I personally advice this one).

steps.headline: Insert it in in your game.
Press View and open Explorer if you don't have it opened.
After that press look for Kohl's Admin Commands V2 in Workspace and double click it.
Script will appear.
steps.description: After that in 14th line change "false" into "true" and under it change 0 into your Admin Game Pass ID.

text: Go to your game page and click "Create a Game Pass".  Wait. When you finish uploading your game pass, press "Configure this Game Pass". Tick 'Sell this item' and enter price. When you finish, press Save. Create the script. Open Roblox Studio. Then open your game in Edit mode.  Press Insert, then Search and type Kohl's Admin Commands V2 (I use this model too. It has lots of commands and no viruses, so I personally advice this one). Insert it in in your game.  Press View and open Explorer if you don't have it opened.  After that press look for Kohl's Admin Commands V2 in Workspace and double click it.  Script will appear. After that in 14th line change "false" into "true" and under it change 0 into your Admin Game Pass ID. Close Roblox Studio and Save.
